note.p: German merchant and consul-general. Consul-general of Sweden and Norway in Messina, Sicily, 1851–82. Merchant in Berlin until 1897. Honoured in the flatworm name Pseudostomum klostermanni (von Graf, 1874), or Turbella klostermanni (von Graff, 1874).
Hans G. Hansson, Database of biographical etymology of marine organism names (BEMON), April 2008, http://www.tmbl.gu.se/libdb/libdb.html (accessed 9 December 2008).
